price: Dhugumatti, bakka wal bu’uu halkaniifi guyyaa keessa, waan Rabbiin samiileefi dachii keessatti uume keessaas namoota (Rabbiin) sodaataniif mallattooleetu jira
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna fī ikh'tilāfi al-layli wal-nahāri wamā khalaqa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin liqawmin yattaqūna
